common.creator-settings-delete-tooltip: If you delete a poll, it will automatically end. You can still access the results later. Participants will no longer be able to access the poll after it has been deleted.
common.creator-settings-pause-tooltip: You can pause the poll and resume it later. Participants will not receive a notification upon entering a room. You can still make changes to the settings even when the poll is paused. Participants will still have access to the poll.
common.creator-settings-continue-tooltip: Participants will receive a notification upon entering a room and can vote again.
common.tooltip-option-select-result-visibility: Show votes in real-time for everyone
common.tooltip-option-select-views-visibility: Show participation in real-time for everyone
